mapper.insert: INSERT INTO playlist_tracks (playlist_id, track_id, track_name, artist_name, image_url) VALUES (#{playlistId}, #{trackId}, #{trackName}, #{artistName}, #{imageUrl})
mapper.select: SELECT id, playlist_id, track_id, track_name, artist_name, image_url, created_at FROM playlist_tracks WHERE playlist_id = #{playlistId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM playlist_tracks WHERE playlist_id = #{playlistId} AND track_id = #{trackId}
